title: Introducing the £18,000 chair, created by industrial designer Ron Arad and homeware brand OKA
text:
In design terms, it’s not the most obvious pairing: the industrial designer Ron Arad, known for his sculptural, modernist architecture and furniture; and the homeware brand OKA, known for its accessible twist on British country-house style.

Yet this week they have revealed the result of their unexpected collaboration: the AKO chair, available in a limited edition of 10, and yours for £18,000.

“It was really a chance encounter that brought us together through a mutual friend,” says Sue Jones, OKA’s creative director and co-founder. “Knowing us both, they felt that despite our different styles, we actually share a passion for comfort, luxury and beauty. When Ron and I first met we instantly found a common ground (as well as sharing a similar sense of humour), and I was blown away by his obvious enthusiasm to work together.”
